A1: Cloud mining is a remote mining mode. Users rent computing power through the platform to earn cryptocurrency mining rewards without needing to purchase and maintain physical mining machines.
Q2: How are my earnings calculated and distributed?
A2: Daily Earnings = (Your Hashpower / Total Network Hashpower) × Daily Block Rewards - Platform Service Fee (including electricity, maintenance, etc.). Calculations are fully transparent, and earnings are automatically distributed daily to your account.
